title: Puff the Magic Dragon
description: Puff the Magic Dragon lived by the sea, and frolicked in the autumn mist in a land called Honah Lee.So begins the enchanting adventures of a lonely little boy named Jackie and a magical dragon named Puff. They journey to the land of Honah Lee, and on their way meet a pirate who's really a baker, a skyful of mean clouds, a falling star that needs to be rescued, and a bunch of very peculiar creatures known as Sneezes. Jackie learns that growing up can be truly magical as long as you have a dragon named Puff to show you the way.This contemporary fairy tale, based on one of America's favorite songs, will appeal to readers of all ages.
author: Romeo Muller
